sars2pack 0.0.15

Reference

Data resources

Functions for accessing (typically web-based) data resources.

country_metadata()

Get basic country data

covidtracker_data()

US State-level data including test results

enriched_jhu_data()

Get enriched jhu dataset as a list of three data.frames

jhu_data()

Global COVID-19 data from JHU CSSEGIS

nytimes_county_data() nytimes_state_data()

United States county and state level data from the New York Times

usa_facts_data()

United States state and county level data from USAFacts

Additional

cumulative_events_ejhu()

constructor for covid_events

demo_simulation()

set up a simulation as demonstrated by John C Mallery

form_incident_events()

transform cumulative data to daily incidence

get_series()

supersimple series extraction

integer_to_fips()

convert an integer to fips

jhu_data_to_excel()

Create +/- write excel format of enriched JHU global data

mar19df

march 19 result of CSSEGISandData/COVID-19/ time series data retrieval as data.frame

mar19dt

march 19 result of CSSEGISandData/COVID-19/ time series data retrieval as data.table

plot.covid_events()

plot for covid_events

plot2(<R0.sR>)

version of R0:::plot.R0.sR that does not use dev.new

plot2()

generic for simpler plotter for R0.sR

plot_series()

supersimple series plotter

plotfit2(<R0.sR>)

version of R0:::plotfit.R0.sR that does not use dev.new

plotfit2()

generic for simpler plotter for plotfit for R0.sR

print(<covid_events>)

print for a covid_events instance

trim_from()

trim early part of series, generic

trim_from(<covid_events>)

trim early part of series

trim_leading_values()

trim leading repeats of a given value from a vector

us_county_geo_details()

United States county-level geographic details

us_healthcare_capacity()

United States healthcare system capacity by provider

Contents
